thread.title: Four injured after taxi, bakkie collide
thread.title_full: Four injured after taxi, bakkie collide | News24

author: news24.com
title: Four injured after taxi, bakkie collide
text:
Durban - Four people were injured on Saturday when a bakkie and taxi collided on Alexandra Road in Pietermaritzburg.
ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring said paramedics found both the taxi and bakkie blocking the slow lane of the road when they arrived on scene.
"On assessment, paramedics found that four people on scene had sustained only minor injuries in the collision. Paramedics treated the patients for their injuries and thereafter transported them to Northdale Hospital for further assessment."
